rows.label: tev055301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Kopopo about the provisional government.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Kopopo about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Kopopo planning to go to provisional government
and cram Nopon demands down...
Uh, to lobby for Nopon-friendly laws![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0002
rows.name: Kopopo send messengers to bigwigs every single night.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0003
rows.name:
...Bribe them? Meh! This not about money!
Nopon just want bigwigs to know who true friends of
bigwig actually are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0004
rows.name:
That why Kopopo send one Nopon per day to room of
each bigwig. Just like pillow-delivery service, but fluffier.
Oh, and if pillows never stopped talking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0005
rows.name:
Soon all bigwigs will see things through lens of
Kopopo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0008
rows.name:
Kopopo is very intent on forcing...
Er, CONVINCING bigwigs to listen to Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0009
rows.name:
But Kopopo not forget to speak up for Sun'barac and
others. Kopopo is true man of people.
Fights for rights of all friends![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0010
rows.name:
That mostly because government is lot like business.
If Kopopo only look after own needs, no one trusts
Kopopo anymore.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0011
rows.name:
Kopopo shared this philosophy with Sun'barac,
who seemed very moved. That sure sign Sun'barac
is quality fellow![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Kopopo about the election.

rows.label: tev055301_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Kopopo about recent developments.

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0012
rows.name:
Meh-meh-meeeh! Kopopo not picked as representative!
No fair![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0013
rows.name:
All hard work of Kopopo sending fluffy Nopon to
convince bigwigs now up in smoke! Pffft![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0014
rows.name:
...Wait. Kopopo gets it! Kopopo just need to turn this
into business![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0015
rows.name:
Kopopo call it "Nopon-a-Day!" Nopon come to houses
of friends to cook and clean for them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0016
rows.name:
And no big deal if cooking tastes terrible and nothing
ever really gets clean, because Nopon so cute and easy
to forgive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0017
rows.name:
Now Kopopo just needs to think of list of optional
services and surcharges. Meh! This is gold mine![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0021
rows.name:
Kopopo briefly in hot water because Nopon who
helped with election think they should get paid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0022
rows.name:
Thankfully, Sun'barac find way to put them on
provisional government payroll as accountants.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0023
rows.name:
Nopon merchants all very good at number-crunching.
Also good at penny-pinching. Perfect for public service![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055301_MSG0026
rows.name:
Kopopo must face itâ€”Sun'barac is great politician.
Many smart choices already being made.[ST:wait ]
